title: New: October Tooth – Fill
content:
Beautiful artwork, beautiful songs from Tennessee’s October Tooth.

Really intimate sounding vocals litter Casiotone For The Painfully Alone styled programmed beats; it’s a delicate composition, deserving of your attention for it’s four minute length. Check out Fill below, lifted from a self-released EP, out on Bandcamp.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
